level.heading: Exchange of official personnel information.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to the provisions of §§ 1-628.01 and 1-631.02, shall enter into an agreement with the United States Civil Service Commission for the exchange of official personnel information, to the extent mutually agreed upon, between the District and federal government in accordance with limitations imposed by this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.
